item.title: Welcome to B&B "Au Mont des Collines"
item.description: In the prolongation of the Flemish Ardennes, between the Muziekbos (Ronse), D’Hoppe (Vloesberg) and the Brakelbos, you will find Ellezelles, also called the witches’ village. This is already Wallonia ! You’ll feel inmediately bewitched by the tranquil and resourcing countryside. Folklore, splendid nature, breathtaking vues, a warm welcome and heartfelt hospitality  are the unmistaken assets of this exceptional B & B.
item.dc:creator: brigitte.devos
